Ranked Lineage

```{r}
ranked_lineage <- read_tsv("../output/ranked_lineage.tsv")
```

```{r}
eukaryota_ranked_lineage <- ranked_lineage %>% filter(!grepl("[B|b]acteria|[A|a]rchaea|[V|v]iruses", Lineage)) %>% head(1000)
```

```{r}
count_elements_in_levels <- function(data, level_term) {
  get_current_lineage <- data %>% filter(grepl(level_term, Lineage))
  paste0(unlist(str_split(c, "Eukaryota")), collapse = "")
}
```
